summary: An email from Mark L. Epstein forwarding a phone text message to Kevin Ponder, with Stacey Richman copied. The text message appears to be a cryptic communication about meeting someone's boss, sent from a phone number.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: Sends an email forwarding a phone text message to Kevin Ponder, with Stacey Richman copied.

persons.name: Kevin Ponder
persons.context: Primary recipient of the forwarded email containing a phone text message.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Copied on the email from Mark L. Epstein forwarding a phone text message to Kevin Ponder.

connections.description: Mark L. Epstein is forwarding a phone text message to Kevin Ponder via email.
Mark L. Epstein copies Stacey Richman on an email forwarding a phone text message.

events.title: Email forwarding phone text
events.description: Mark L. Epstein sends an email forwarding a phone text message to Kevin Ponder, with Stacey Richman copied.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein forwarded a phone text message to Kevin Ponder via email on May 26, 2020.
Attorney Stacey Richman was copied on the email.
The forwarded text message is cryptic, stating 'You have to tell me the name of my boss. He wants to meet you.' and includes a phone number (+16203229434).
